segments.text: Could you tell me where you put my book ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . A Walk in the Woods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn ’ t it on the bookshelf ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . The bookshelf is full of fashion books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then have you put it in the bedroom ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Now would you like to help me look for the book ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Look ! It ’ s just near your foot .
segments.speaker: S2
